list.abs: 原料要求:魔法锁链手套(Chain Gloves)/重型手镯(Heavy Bracers)/吸血鬼手套(Vambraces)  人物、原料要求和上面的情况相同。和上面的CB、Life、吸血相比,这个击退.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from an Anglo-Norman French shortening of Old French avantbras, from avant 'before' + bras 'arm'. Compare with vamplate

means.word_mean: 1. cannon of plate armor protecting the forearm
